readable.title: 3703035378_c6034cac51
readable.content: A big sister in pink is giving her little sister a piggy back ride . An Asian girl is riding piggy back on another girl as they pass some red tape . One child carries another child on her back . One little girl standing with another little girl piggybacking on her back look at an object . Two girls in pink shirts looking at a fountain from behind a red velvet rope .
